com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pointericon

Class SpenPointerIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.pointericon.SpenPointerIcon

  • public class SpenPointerIcon
extends Object
    This class provides more image optoins for the hovering pointer.

    4.0.0

      • setPointerIcon

        public void setPointerIcon(Drawable drawable)
        Set the hover pointer icon to drawable class. If null is assigned in param of Drawable, Hover Icon is not appeared.
        Parameters:
        drawable - drawable image
        Since:
        4.0.0
